ðŸ“– Summary: Linutil is a distro-agnostic toolbox designed to simplify everyday Linux tasks, including application setup and system optimization. It offers a command-line interface with configuration options via TOML files and is available through various package repositories like AUR, OpenSUSE, and Cargo, making it easily accessible for a wide range of Linux users.
